name: inscribe
description: Desktop GUI application that safely applies AI-generated code into an existing codebase

scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w packages/engine && npm run build -w apps/desktop
scripts.dev:desktop: concurrently -k "npm -w packages/shared run dev:build" "npm -w packages/engine run dev:build" "npm -w apps/desktop run dev"
